questions.question_text: Which task would be identified in Best Practice Assessment tool?

discussion.content: I think this is D, https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/content/dam/pan/en_US/partners/nextwave/bpa/best-practice-assessment.pdf

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D

Answer A is wrong. Correct answer is : B. BPA only works as a guidance in the current security industry standard regulations , it will provide recommendations on areas where we can improve the security on different zones, interfaces, policy rules and finally give us a total of percent that represents the level of compliance with the market standards.
D is correct

choices.A: identify the visibility and presence of command-and-control sessions
choices.C: identify the threats associated with each application

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
same as question 1

The key benefit of Palo Alto Networks single-pass architecture (SPA) design is that it allows the addition of new functions to existing hardware without affecting performance.

The single-pass architecture processes all traffic in a single pass, eliminating redundant functions and reducing processing overhead. This allows new security functions to be added without impacting the firewall's performance.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
Should be B, since PA HW has multiple processors. single-pass just mean that multiple processors are evaluating the packet at the same time. parallel processing enables them to add new functionalities without affecting the traffic execution flow.

Selected Answer: B
See comment from freepotatoes in Q1, B make more sense.

choices.A: It requires only one processor to complete all the functions within the box.
choices.B: It allows the addition of new functions to existing hardware without affecting performance.
choices.D: It decodes each network flow multiple times, therefore reducing throughput.
choices.C: It allows the addition of new devices to existing hardware without affecting performance.

questions.question_text: What is the key benefit of Palo Alto Networks single-pass architecture (SPA) design?
Which two actions should be taken prior to installing a decryption policy on an NGFW? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
AB are correct
A and B

Selected Answer: AB
A,B. other answers are what you should NOT do.

Selected Answer: AB
A and B

Selected Answer: AB
A and B should be correct

choices.D: Include all traffic types in decryption policy.
choices.C: Deploy decryption settings all at one time.
choices.A: Ensure throughput will not be an issue.
choices.B: Determine whether local / regional decryption laws apply.
Change the action of real-time-detection category on URL filtering profile.
choices.A: Create a custom URL category and add it on exception of the inline ML profile.
choices.C: Create a custom URL category and add it to the Security policy.

questions.question_text:
Access to a business site is blocked by URL Filtering inline machine learning (ML) and considered as a false-positive.
How should the site be made available?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct. https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/pan-os/10-1/pan-os-web-interface-help/objects/objects-security-profiles-url-filtering/url-filtering-inline-ml
